name: Orchard Archer
description:
Follow merchant quests, harvest apples and get rewards! Do not rush if you find the game hard to play.

CONTROLS:

  • Mouse, WSAD - shoot, move
  • Space - jump
  • R - restart
  • no controller support (sorry :cry:)

- "Apples..." he whispered. Why the heck they need so many apples? As if like they are making hard cider after all the holid..

- Apple pies! Everyone loves Apple Pies!

- Nooo. This could not be right. These are not those regular apples for you baking hobby. These are low-poly apples, they explode, summon gods and who knows what else!

- Sigh...

- Well, there is only one way to find out. Bring me The Bow. I will make him talk.
